Kim Hammond.action: Gives his son a sharp look and glares at Lou upon their arrival.

Kim Hammond.action: Asks for explanations regarding the brawl and inspects Lou's ski mask.

Kim Hammond.action: Allows the teachers to exit after taking responsibility for handling the situation himself.

Kim Hammond.action: Frowns when Alex interrupts, showing concern about the situation.

Kim Hammond.action: Angrily confronts Lou for his disrespectful behavior and suspends him indefinitely.

Kim Hammond.action: Admits openly that he will play favorites with his son Alex.

Kim Hammond.action: Tells Lou to leave school grounds and threatens arrest if he does not comply.

Kim Hammond.action: Instructs Alex to see the nurse and then return.

Kim Hammond.action: Angrily throws Lou's ski mask into the trash can.

Kim Hammond.action: Interrupts Lou and questions the truth of the accusation against his son Alex.

Kim Hammond.action: Raises his voice in anger but maintains authority by suspending Lou indefinitely and threatening arrest for trespassing.

Kim Hammond.action: Admits openly that he will play favorites with his son Alex.

Kim Hammond.action: Attempts to maintain composure and a positive front despite the emotional weight of the day, calling herself 'The Queen of the Prom' determined not to let it get to her.

Kim Hammond.action: Responds to Nick's sudden embrace with surprise but then smiles and returns the embrace.

Kim Hammond.action: Walks slowly along the rim of the bluffs with Nick, leaning into him and sharing her feelings about the difficult day.

Kim Hammond.action: States that as the Queen of the Prom, she is determined not to let the day get to her and must maintain her composure at all costs.

Kim Hammond.action: Tries a weak smile when discussing her resolve to maintain composure.

Kim Hammond.action: Stands quietly at the foot of the grave with Alex, holding a white rose and dropping it on her sister's grave.

Kim Hammond.action: Turns and moves off after her parents following the grave scene.
